title: Project-related courses - UML, HMI, Tests, Guidelines
description: Anything you might need to make a project, especially an IT project. You got courses about interfaces (HMI), diagrams (UML), methodologies, guidelines, design patterns, and tests.

courses.name: HMI
courses.title: How to make Human-machine interfaces (HMI)
courses.desc: Learn about what you must think before making an interface. Tools to make mock-ups are also listed here.

courses.name: UML
courses.title: Learn UML diagrams
courses.desc: UML is a tool used to work on the conception part of a project.

courses.name: Make a project
courses.title: How to make a project (theory)
courses.desc: What's a project in real-life and how one should handle it.

courses.name: Make Git project
courses.title: How to make a Git project
courses.desc: A gathering of everything related to Git projects and their management.

courses.name: Agile scrum
courses.title: Learn Agile Scrum Methodology
courses.desc: A project methodology following the Agile guidelines.

courses.name: Design patterns
courses.title: Learn Design-patterns (GOF/GRASP), and Anti-patterns
courses.desc: Because writing code can be easier, and you would rather want to learn the good practices beforehand.

courses.name: Tests
courses.title: Learn Tests, and Test-driven development
courses.desc: What are tests and assertions? What's the Test-driven development and the Behavior-driven development?

courses.name: Code guidelines
courses.title: Learn about code guidelines
courses.desc: What are the best practices when writing code? KISS, YAGNI, SOLID, DRY, and a lot more!

courses.name: Methodologies
courses.title: Learn programming methodologies
courses.desc: Learn more about methods like model-driven dev, data-driven...
